text: I love documents generated in R markdown and Julia seems to work fine in general

elements.text: I love documents generated in R markdown and Julia seems to work fine in general

text: Rmarkdown is great but JuliaCall compilation times are really slow. If all you need is a good looking LaTeX document that runs Julia code I prefer weave.jl

elements.text: Rmarkdown is great but JuliaCall compilation times are really slow. If all you need is a good looking LaTeX document that runs Julia code I prefer weave.jl
